data.title: When are Jon Rahm, Tommy Fleetwood and Rory McIlroy playing?
data.meta_description: Here are the tee times for the final round of the 2024 Olympic Games men's golf tournament from Le Golf National.
data.text:
Paris 2024: Men's golf round three tee times - When are Jon Rahm, Tommy Fleetwood and Rory McIlroy playing?

ByAndrew Wright

Published 03/08/2024 at 23:00 GMT

The 2024 Olympic Games men's golf tournament concludes on Sunday, August 4 at Le Golf National. Spain's Jon Rahm leads the way with American defending champion Xander Schauffele at -14. Team GB's Tommy Fleetwood is a shot behind, while Rory McIlroy is also lurking after a strong Saturday showing. World No. 1 Scottie Scheffler is alongside McIlroy at -10, while Sweden's Ludvig Aberg is -9.

'To have two is something else' - Schauffele revels in winning second major at Open

The men’s golf tournament at the 2024 Paris Olympic Games will be won and lost on Sunday at Le Golf National, with the first of 20 groups teeing off at 8am UK time.

Heading into the final round, Spain's Jon Rahm is tied at the top at -14 with American defending champion Xander Schauffele.

Team GB's Tommy Fleetwood sits a shot behind but will be in the final group as he seeks the biggest title of his career.

Olympic Games Paris 2024

Who is Lydia Ko? The golfer who won gold for New Zealand at Paris 2024

12 hours ago

Denmark's Nicolai Hojgaard shares fourth with Japan's Hideki Matsuyama at -11, with Rory McIlroy and world No. 1 Scottie Scheffler a shot further back at -10.

It could hardly be better poised with a number of the biggest names in the sport in position to go for gold.

Here is a rundown of the tee times for the fourth and final round.

2024 Men’s Olympic Golf Competition: Round 4 tee times

All times BST

8:00am: Camilo Villegas, Matthieu Pavon

8:11am: Mito Pereira, Phachara Khongwatmai, Yechun Yuan

8:22am: Zecheng Dou, Daniel Hillier, Kiradech Aphibarnrat

8:33am: Kristoffer Ventura, Adrian Meronk, Emiliano Grillo

8:44am: Nico Echavarria, Kevin Yu, Gaganjeet Bhullar

8:55am: Tapio Pulkkanen, Rafa Campos, Keita Nakajima

9:11am: Gavin Green, Abraham Ancer, Alex Noren

9:22am: Shubhankar Sharma, Viktor Hovland, Matthias Schmid

9:33am: Nick Taylor, Sepp Straka, Joel Girrbach

9:44am: Adrien Dumont de Chassart, Fabrizio Zanotti, Sami Valimaki

9:55am: David Puig, Min Woo Lee, Guido Migliozzi

10:06am: Ryan Fox, Collin Morikawa, Carlos Ortiz

10:17am: Stephan Jaeger, Wyndham Clark, Shane Lowry

10:33am: Alejandro Tosti, C.T. Pan, Matteo Manassero

10:44am: Erik van Rooyen, Byeong Hun An, Corey Conners

10:55am: Christiaan Bezuidenhout, Thorbjørn Olesen, Victor Perez

11:06am: Ludvig Åberg, Jason Day, Joaquin Niemann

11:17am: Scottie Scheffler, Tom Kim, Thomas Detry

11:28am: Nicolai Højgaard, Hideki Matsuyama, Rory McIlroy

11:39am: Jon Rahm, Xander Schauffele, Tommy Fleetwood

- - -
